"Xiera": "Hello! Let's learn about the Basics of the Fighter class!"
"When the gear gage of Twin Dagger Gear goes up a stage, <red>Photon Arts become stronger<c>."
"Let's start with <red>raising the Gear Gauge by two stages<c>."
"Task 1: <yellow>Use a Photon Art after 2 Gear stages.<c>"
"Task 1: <yellow>Use a Photon Art after 2 Gear stages.<c>"

"・Jump using <%Jump> and use <%WeaponAction> to raise the gauge by 2 stages.
・Follow up by doing a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>"

"・Jump using <%Jump> and use <%MainPaletteC> to raise the gauge by 2 stages.
・Follow up by doing a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>"

"If you can master the skill \"Twin Dagger Gear\", you can bring out the performance of Twin Daggers even further.

The Gear Gauge will rise by jumping or by using your
Weapon Action.

Each stage on the Gear Gauge will boost the power of
Photon Arts."
